Link

Use a link to refer the user to another URL, e.g. a new page or a document.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-link

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-link

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-link/src/scss/link";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Link

Basic example of a link

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">Terug naar overzicht</a>

Link block

A link that is displayed as a block element, taking the width of the parent container.

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--block">Terug naar overzicht</a>

Link with icon before text

A link with an icon before the text label, always add the icon before the text label when using a stand-alone link.

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Terug naar overzicht
    </a>

Link with icon after text

A link with an icon after the text label, always add the icon after the text label when using a link in a sentence.

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">
      Terug naar overzicht
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </a>

Link external

When a link opens a new window, add the external icon.

Ga naar Vlaanderen.be 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">
      Ga naar Vlaanderen.be
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-link__icon--light vl-vi vl-vi-external" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </a>

Link close

A link with a close icon before the text label, always add a text label to your icon to provide context for the user.

Venster sluiten 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Venster sluiten
    </a>

Link with icon before text

A bold link with an icon before the text label, always add the icon before the text label when using a stand-alone link.

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--bold">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Terug naar overzicht
    </a>

Link with icon after text

A bold link with an icon after the text label, always add the icon after the text label when using a link in a sentence.

Terug naar overzicht 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--bold">
      Terug naar overzicht
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-vi vl-vi-arrow-right-fat" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </a>

Link external

When a bold link opens a new window, add the external icon.

Ga naar Vlaanderen.be 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--bold">
      Ga naar Vlaanderen.be
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--after vl-link__icon--light vl-vi vl-vi-external" aria-hidden="true"></i>
  </a>

Link close

A bold link with a close icon before the text label, always add a text label to your icon to provide context for the user.

Venster sluiten 
      <a href="#" class="vl-link vl-link--bold">
    <i class="vl-link__icon vl-link__icon--before vl-vi vl-vi-cross" aria-hidden="true" ></i>
      Venster sluiten
    </a>
